### Add your comment and screenshots

上面的下载链接是一个叫做“拼多多”的软件，英文名叫做“temu”下面两个域名建议禁止，应该将下面的两个域名添加到Adguard DNS过滤器
ta.pinduoduo.com
th.pinduoduo.com
下面三条规则建议添加到Adguard防跟踪过滤器，你们再看一下图，图中的url是软件为了绕过规则，所以使用IP，我就用这三条规则拦截，目前软件没有异常。url内容中可以看出会上传版本号等等信息，这侵犯隐私，我觉得应该禁止。为了避免以后IP更改导致规则失效，规则应该不包含IP。
||*d4?appid*type*
||*/d?id=*type*
||*/d?dn=*&id*&type=*

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/daf635be-04c5-4e31-b231-f2f0b5e6e061)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/25762a81-5f43-4527-87f4-45204f05dccb)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9243ab92-d73e-4f77-8fe7-42e26c99d8cc)

你好，我提的这个issue其实与广告无关，但还是想着尝试提一下。在中国很多公司为了节省网络费用，因此就在软件中默认启用pcdn等技术，以此来降低费用，但是中国的网络运营商打击pcdn，有一些用户因为软件的pcdn上传了太多流量，比如一天内上传了几TB，然后导致宽带被限速或者封禁。于是我收集了很多pcdn域名，希望能够添加到Adguard DNS过滤器中，这个pcdn很恶心，影响到不少人了。下面的部分域名出现在上面下载链接对应的软件

xy-livewebbs2pcdn.msstatic.com^

上面有一些域名很相似，所以我准备了几条规则拦截。上面的域名是在我手机上发现的，我都在我手机中封禁了，并没有发现有什么异常

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками. Скорее всего проявились особенности Safari.

Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
> Hello,
> it is not new to current version, it was always like this.
> The issue is that adguard custom filter hides elements from the view setting "display: none" css rule instead of removing the element from the page. This causes autoplay video content still work in background regardless if I block this or not.
> 
> Expected behavior would be just to completely hide the elements from the page so they could not play videos.
> 
> In this example I show twitch.tv page.

@akondrasev You may try `remove: true`.
For example, instead of 
`example.com##body div`
you may use removing
`example.com#$#body div { remove: true; }`

pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

#200584

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.body:

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

Adguard 4.9

Missed analytics or tracker

the problem is with app, not a site

Mobile

https://cd.pddpic.com/volantis-open/mobile-CI-tag/2025-03-05/6a501cab90bdbb7c400a98184b54f225.apk

### Add your comment and screenshots

上面的下载链接是一个叫做“拼多多”的软件，英文名叫做“temu”下面两个域名建议禁止，应该将下面的两个域名添加到Adguard DNS过滤器
ta.pinduoduo.com
th.pinduoduo.com
下面三条规则建议添加到Adguard防跟踪过滤器，你们再看一下图，图中的url是软件为了绕过规则，所以使用IP，我就用这三条规则拦截，目前软件没有异常。url内容中可以看出会上传版本号等等信息，这侵犯隐私，我觉得应该禁止。为了避免以后IP更改导致规则失效，规则应该不包含IP。
||*d4?appid*type*
||*/d?id=*type*
||*/d?dn=*&id*&type=*
